name: Check System Details
author: Prabhat Rai

sections.description:
Check System Details – Easily Check Your Installation and Server Details

**No Setup Required**

The details include:

WordPress Details

  • WordPress address
  • Site address
  • WordPress version
  • WordPress multisite
  • WordPress memory
  • WordPress debug
  • WordPress debug
  • WordPress cron
  • WordPress Language

Current Theme Details

  • Name
  • Version
  • Description
  • Author

Installed Plugin Details

  • Plugin name with hyperlink to plugin’s website
  • Version
  • Author

Server Details

  • Max input timeout
  • Max input vars
  • Max file upload
  • Max file upload

Database Details

  • Database Name
  • Database Host
  • Database Charset
  • Database Prefix

Names of existing Database Tables

New Addition

htaccess File Content

Robots.txt Content

Debug log content – Last 100 lines

A quick overview of the plugin:
sections.changelog:
1.1.1

  • Support with WordPress 6.2.2

1.1.0

  • htaccess File Content
  • Robots.txt Content
  • Debug log content – Last 100 lines

1.0.0

  • Initial version

short_description: Easily check your WordPress installation and server details along with database tables, installed plugins, and the active theme.
